article_title: Health Insurers Hire Thousands Of Nurses To Coordinate Care

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Health insurance companies are hiring record numbers of nurses as the Affordable Care Act boosts the number of patients with medical coverage and plans look for ways to coordinate care of the newly insured. At the nation’s largest health insurance company, UnitedHealth Group (UNH), more than 7,000 additional nurses have been [...]
